resources:
RoboKids
Welcome Back Sign Up Now Open Close Sign up Skip
Is the app free ? What is the appropriate age to benefit from the application ? Do I have to be connected to the Internet while using the application ? How does my child benefit from the app ? I created my account on an Android device Can I sign in with an iOS device ? How do I benefit from the reports section ? Can I change the language of the application ? How do I login to the RoboKids app ?
Yes, the application is free and you can download it from the phone store and enjoy the application The current content of the application is suitable for children from the age of 3 to 9 years, and in the following versions we will work to provide content suitable for more age groups The current version of the application requires an Internet connection The application offers your child many cartoon series, tales and songs under the supervision of a group of psychological educational specialists in an attractive artistic framework. It helps them develop and develop them and perform their educational role optimally Currently, you can not register through the iOS because the application works on the Android system only. The RoboKids application provides you with different types of reports: - Views reports: It presents you with what your child has watched of educational and entertainment content such as episodes, series, songs, stories and what they contain of interesting and useful values. Usage Reports: Find out how long your child has been using the app for educational and entertainment content over the course of the week and the average daily usage. At the moment, the application provides two main languages, Arabic and English In the event that you have an account on the RoboKids application: 
 -Open the RoboKids app from the device you want to log in with. 
 -Choose "Login". Enter the email of your account in the RoboKids app. 
 -Type your password and press the "Go" button. 
If you are a new user, you must first create an account via the following steps: 
- Open the RoboKids app. 
- Parental entry selection. 
- Choose "Create a new account". 
- Enter your email and password. 
- Choose the country. 
- Click "Login".
